original_title: 初めてのソロCAMP△で教え魔キャンパーに犯〇れて・・・
overview: ▲ What is a teaching demon? ▲ I started teaching my skills to strangers with kindness, even though I wasn't asked for it. At first glance, it seems to be seen by good people, but it is often considered by the person who teaches that it is an extra step, and it has become a hot topic on the Internet in recent years. Sakura, who comes to the campsite alone to experience the trendy solo camp for the first time, meets Iizuka, a veteran solo camper. At first, she thought she was a kind person and liked Sakura, but ...
title: When CAMPING By Herself For The First Time, She Gets Fucked By A Camper Who Is A Teaching Freak… Moko Sakura
